verses.verse: בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> My son אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if עָרַ֣בְתָּ <S%H6148><s%> if thou be surety לְרֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7453><s%> for thy friend תָּקַ֖עְתָּ <S%H8628><s%> [if] thou hast stricken לַזָּ֣ר <S%H2114><s%> with a stranger כַּפֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H3709><s%> thy hand

נוֹקַ֥שְׁתָּ <S%H3369><s%> Thou art snared בְאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> with the words פִ֑יךָ <S%H6310><s%> of thy mouth נִ֝לְכַּ֗דְתָּ <S%H3920><s%> thou art taken בְּאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> with the words פִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> of thy mouth

עֲשֵׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> Do זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֵפ֪וֹא ׀ <S%H645><s%> this now בְּנִ֡י <S%H1121><s%> my son וְֽהִנָּצֵ֗ל <S%H5337><s%> and deliver כִּ֘י <S%H3588><s%> Since בָ֤אתָ <S%H935><s%> thyself when thou art come בְכַף־ <S%H3709><s%> into the hand רֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7453><s%> of thy friend לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go הִ֝תְרַפֵּ֗ס <S%H7511><s%> humble וּרְהַ֥ב <S%H7292><s%> thyself and make sure רֵעֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H7453><s%> thy friend

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor תִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Give שֵׁנָ֣ה <S%H8142><s%> not sleep לְעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> to thine eyes וּ֝תְנוּמָ֗ה <S%H8572><s%> nor slumber לְעַפְעַפֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H6079><s%> to thine eyelids

הִ֭נָּצֵל <S%H5337><s%> Deliver כִּצְבִ֣י <S%H6643><s%> thyself as a roe מִיָּ֑ד <S%H3027><s%> from the hand וּ֝כְצִפּ֗וֹר <S%H6833><s%> [of the hunter] and as a bird מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> from the hand יָקֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H3353><s%> of the fowler פ לֵֽךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> along אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to
נְמָלָ֥ה <S%H5244><s%> to the ant עָצֵ֑ל <S%H6102><s%> thou sluggard רְאֵ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> consider דְרָכֶ֣יהָ <S%H1870><s%> her ways וַחֲכָֽם׃ <S%H2449><s%> and be wise
אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> Which אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> having לָ֥הּ קָצִ֗ין <S%H7101><s%> Which having no guide שֹׁטֵ֥ר <S%H7860><s%> overseer וּמֹשֵֽׁל׃ <S%H4910><s%> or ruler

תָּכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> Provideth בַּקַּ֣יִץ <S%H7019><s%> in the summer לַחְמָ֑הּ <S%H3899><s%> her meat אָגְרָ֥ה <S%H103><s%> [and] gathereth בַ֝קָּצִ֗יר <S%H7105><s%> in the harvest מַאֲכָלָֽהּ׃ <S%H3978><s%> her food

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long מָתַ֖י <S%H4970><s%> How עָצֵ֥ל ׀ <S%H6102><s%> slothful תִּשְׁכָּ֑ב <S%H7901><s%> How long wilt thou sleep מָ֝תַ֗י <S%H4970><s%> How תָּק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> arise מִשְּׁנָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8142><s%> sleep

מְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> [Yet] a little שֵׁ֭נוֹת <S%H8142><s%> sleep מְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> a little תְּנוּמ֑וֹת <S%H8572><s%> slumber מְעַ֓ט ׀ <S%H4592><s%> a little חִבֻּ֖ק <S%H2264><s%> folding יָדַ֣יִם <S%H3027><s%> of the hands לִשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H7901><s%> to sleep

וּבָֽא־ <S%H935><s%> come כִמְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> as one that travelleth רֵאשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H7389><s%> So shall thy poverty וּ֝מַחְסֹֽרְךָ֗ <S%H4270><s%> and thy want כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man מָגֵֽן׃ <S%H4043><s%> as an armed פ

אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> person בְּ֭לִיַּעַל <S%H1100><s%> A naughty אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> a wicked ה֝וֹלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walketh עִקְּשׁ֥וּת <S%H6143><s%> with a froward פֶּֽה׃ <S%H6310><s%> mouth

קֹרֵ֣ץ <S%H7169><s%> He winketh בְּ֭עֵינָיו <S%H5869><s%> with his eyes מֹלֵ֣ל <S%H4448><s%> he speaketh בְּרַגְלָ֑ו <S%H7272><s%> with his feet מֹ֝רֶ֗ה <S%H3384><s%> he teacheth בְּאֶצְבְּעֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H676><s%> with his fingers

תַּֽהְפֻּכ֨וֹת ׀ <S%H8419><s%> Frowardness בְּלִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> [is] in his heart חֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H2790><s%> he deviseth רָ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> mischief בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner עֵ֑ת <S%H6256><s%> continually [מְדָנִים כ] (מִדְיָנִ֥ים <S%H4066><s%> brawling ק) יְשַׁלֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H7971><s%> he soweth

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that פִּ֭תְאֹם <S%H6597><s%> suddenly יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> come אֵיד֑וֹ <S%H343><s%> Therefore shall his calamity פֶּ֥תַע <S%H6621><s%> suddenly יִ֝שָּׁבֵ֗ר <S%H7665><s%> shall he be broken וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <S%H4832><s%> without remedy פ

שֶׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> These six הֵ֭נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in שָׂנֵ֣א <S%H8130><s%> hate יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [things] doth the LORD וְ֝שֶׁ֗בַע <S%H7651><s%> yea seven [תֹּועֲבֹות כ] (תֹּועֲבַ֥ת <S%H8441><s%> Tolaites ק) נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> unto him

עֵינַ֣יִם <S%H5869><s%> look רָ֭מוֹת <S%H7311><s%> A proud לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> a lying וְ֝יָדַ֗יִם <S%H3027><s%> and hands שֹׁפְכ֥וֹת <S%H8210><s%> that shed דָּם־ <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִֽי׃ <S%H5355><s%> innocent

לֵ֗ב <S%H3820><s%> An heart חֹ֭רֵשׁ <S%H2790><s%> that deviseth מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <S%H4284><s%> imaginations אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> wicked רַגְלַ֥יִם <S%H7272><s%> feet מְ֝מַהֲר֗וֹת <S%H4116><s%> that be swift לָר֥וּץ <S%H7323><s%> in running לָֽרָעָה׃ <S%H7451><s%> to mischief

יָפִ֣יחַ <S%H6315><s%> [that] speaketh כְּ֭זָבִים <S%H3577><s%> lies עֵ֣ד <S%H5707><s%> witness שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> A false וּמְשַׁלֵּ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> and he that soweth מְ֝דָנִ֗ים <S%H4090><s%> discord בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> among אַחִֽים׃ <S%H251><s%> among brethren פ

נְצֹ֣ר <S%H5341><s%> keep בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> My son מִצְוַ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> commandment אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father's וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֝טֹּ֗שׁ <S%H5203><s%> and forsake תּוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> not the law אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H517><s%> of thy mother

קָשְׁרֵ֣ם <S%H7194><s%> Bind עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> around לִבְּךָ֣ <S%H3820><s%> upon thine heart תָמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> them continually עָ֝נְדֵ֗ם <S%H6029><s%> [and] tie עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> around גַּרְגְּרֹתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1621><s%> them about thy neck

בְּהִתְהַלֶּכְךָ֨ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> When thou goest תַּנְחֶ֬ה <S%H5148><s%> it shall lead אֹתָ֗ךְ <S%H853><s%> בְּֽ֭שָׁכְבְּךָ <S%H7901><s%> thee when thou sleepest תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> it shall keep עָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5921><s%> over וַ֝הֲקִיצ֗וֹתָ <S%H6974><s%> thee and [when] thou awakest הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> they תְשִׂיחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7878><s%> it shall talk

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> is a נֵ֣ר <S%H5216><s%> [is] a lamp מִ֭צְוָה <S%H4687><s%> For the commandment וְת֣וֹרָה <S%H8451><s%> and the law א֑וֹר <S%H216><s%> [is] light וְדֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [are] the way חַ֝יִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> of life תּוֹכְח֥וֹת <S%H8433><s%> and reproofs מוּסָֽר׃ <S%H4148><s%> of instruction

לִ֭שְׁמָרְךָ <S%H8104><s%> To keep מֵאֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> woman רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> thee from the evil מֵֽ֝חֶלְקַ֗ת <S%H2513><s%> from the flattery לָשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> of the tongue נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <S%H5237><s%> of a strange woman

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor תַּחְמֹ֣ד <S%H2530><s%> Lust יָ֭פְיָהּ <S%H3308><s%> not after her beauty בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> in thine heart וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor תִּ֝קָּֽחֲךָ֗ <S%H3947><s%> neither let her take בְּעַפְעַפֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H6079><s%> thee with her eyelids

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> on בְעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> For by means of אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> woman זוֹנָ֗ה <S%H2181><s%> a whorish עַֽד־ <S%H5704><s%> against כִּכַּ֫ר <S%H3603><s%> [a man is brought] to a piece לָ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread וְאֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> ess אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> life יְקָרָ֣ה <S%H3368><s%> for the precious תָצֽוּד׃ <S%H6679><s%> will hunt פ

הֲיַחְתֶּ֤ה <S%H2846><s%> take אִ֓ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Can a man אֵ֬שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire בְּחֵיק֑וֹ <S%H2436><s%> in his bosom וּ֝בְגָדָ֗יו <S%H899><s%> and his clothes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשָּׂרַֽפְנָה׃ <S%H8313><s%> not be burned

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or יְהַלֵּ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Can one עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגֶּחָלִ֑ים <S%H1513><s%> upon hot coals וְ֝רַגְלָ֗יו <S%H7272><s%> and his feet לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִכָּוֶֽינָה׃ <S%H3554><s%> not be burned

כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> So הַ֭בָּא <S%H935><s%> So he that goeth in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to his neighbour's לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> her will not יִ֝נָּקֶ֗ה <S%H5352><s%> her shall not be innocent כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> Whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> whosoever toucheth בָּֽהּ׃

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָב֣וּזוּ <S%H936><s%> [Men] do not despise לַ֭גַּנָּב <S%H1590><s%> a thief כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> if יִגְנ֑וֹב <S%H1589><s%> if he steal לְמַלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> to satisfy נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when יִרְעָֽב׃ <S%H7456><s%> when he is hungry

וְ֭נִמְצָא <S%H4672><s%> But [if] he be found יְשַׁלֵּ֣ם <S%H7999><s%> he shall restore שִׁבְעָתָ֑יִם <S%H7659><s%> sevenfold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all ה֖וֹן <S%H1952><s%> all the substance בֵּית֣וֹ <S%H1004><s%> of his house יִתֵּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> he shall give

נֹאֵ֣ף <S%H5003><s%> [But] whoso committeth adultery אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> with a woman חֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> lacketh לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> understanding מַֽשְׁחִ֥ית <S%H7843><s%> it destroyeth נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his own soul ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יַעֲשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <S%H6213><s%> he [that] doeth

נֶֽגַע־ <S%H5061><s%> A wound וְקָל֥וֹן <S%H7036><s%> and dishonour יִמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> shall he get וְ֝חֶרְפָּת֗וֹ <S%H2781><s%> and his reproach לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִמָּחֶֽה׃ <S%H4229><s%> shall not be wiped away

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For קִנְאָ֥ה <S%H7068><s%> For jealousy חֲמַת־ <S%H2534><s%> [is] the rage גָּ֑בֶר <S%H1397><s%> of a man וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and he will not יַ֝חְמ֗וֹל <S%H2550><s%> therefore he will not spare בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day נָקָֽם׃ <S%H5359><s%> of vengeance

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִ֭שָּׂא <S%H5375><s%> accept פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> accept כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any כֹּ֑פֶר <S%H3724><s%> any ransom וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יֹ֝אבֶ֗ה <S%H14><s%> neither will he rest content כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> though תַרְבֶּה־ <S%H7235><s%> though thou givest many שֹֽׁחַד׃ <S%H7810><s%> gifts פ
